channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Update Technical Rescue; INC#1492; 10:08PM; 1349 S Flower St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3zfySXW" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3zfySXW</a>; #DowntownLA; Firefighters used specialized cameras to pinpoint the location of the man within the 4-story chimney, prior to breaching the wall from inside the apartment building. LAFD Urban Search and Rescue crews were able to break through into the vertical space using electric-powered tools (to avoid carbon monoxide build up inside the building where the breach operation took place) and entered the shaft below the man and slide him down to safety. The approximately 25-year-old male was transported to a local hospital with moderate injures. The circumstances leading up to him becoming trapped are unclear.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC11 BC701 E203 E209 E210 E3 E9 EM1 HR3 RA13 RA3 RA9 SO1 T10 T3 UR88; CH7; 14; Nicholas Prange

Technical Rescue; INC#1492; 07:55PM; 1349 S Flower St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3zfySXW" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3zfySXW</a>; #DowntownLA; Firefighters are on scene of an abandoned four-story apartment building, where one man is stuck inside of a chimney near the second floor. Firefighters are developing a plan to breach the chimney from inside the building to rescue the patient.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC11 BC701 E203 E209 E210 E3 E9 EM1 HR3 RA13 RA3 RA9 T10 T3 UR88; CH7; 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1416; 07:09PM; 11159 W La Maida St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/45tLwi5" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/45tLwi5</a>; #NorthHollywood; Firefighters responded to a 5,518 sq-ft two-story single-family home with smoke showing. Firefighters made entry to the living space and found the home to be unoccupied and no visible fire. Upon further inspection, crews discovered fire in the attic. Before applying water above, crews performed salvage operations (gathering furniture and belongings together to cover with large tarps/plastic) to protect from damage while extinguishing the fire above. Ultimately, it took 30 firefighters 28 minutes (7:37pm) to respond, complete salvage, and access/extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 E102 E278 E289 E60 E93 RA60 RA86 T78 T89; CH9; 18; Nicholas Prange

Update #CahuengaFire Injury Brush Fire; INC#0849; 04:16PM; 2699 N Cahuenga Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3VMclet" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3VMclet</a>; #HollywoodHills; One LAFD firefighter will be transported to a local hospital in fair condition for a non-life-threatening medical problem. ; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC14 BC18 BC5 CE59 CM20 CM22 E102 E108 E11 E227 E260 E27 E290 E35 E41 E447 E472 E52 E56 E60 E61 E76 E86 E89 E90 E97 EM5 H1 H5 H7 HA1 HA5 HA7 RA27 RA76 SO1 T27 T60 T90 WT88; CH5; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN #CahuengaFire Brush Fire; INC#0849; 03:10PM; 2699 N Cahuenga Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3VMclet" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3VMclet</a>; #HollywoodHills; Over one hundred LAFD firefighters (along with four LA County FD hand crews) stopped all forward progress of the fire at approximately 3 acres (1 hour 52 minutes from the time of alarm). Fire Helicopters made strategic water drops on the head of the fire, while ground crews developed progressive hose lays around both flanks of the fire. Crews have now established a containment perimeter, and will remain on scene into the evening to cool down hot spots within the burn footprint and improve containment lines. No reported injuries. No structures damaged. Cause under investigation.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC14 BC18 BC5 CE59 CM20 CM22 E102 E108 E11 E227 E260 E27 E290 E35 E41 E447 E472 E52 E56 E60 E61 E76 E86 E89 E90 E97 EM5 H1 H5 H7 HA1 HA5 HA7 RA27 RA76 SO1 T27 T60 T90 WT88; CH5; 12; Nicholas Prange

Update #CahuengaFire Brush Fire; INC#0849; 02:17PM; 2699 N Cahuenga Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3VMclet" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3VMclet</a>; #HollywoodHills; LAFD now has 90 firefighters on scene of the Cahuenga Fire fighting the brush fire, which is currently approximately 3 acres in size with moderate wind. Crews continue to impede the progress of the fire, by ground and air. LA County FD There are currently no structures threatened and no evacuation orders. CHP will be closing the southbound Highland exit from the 101 Freeway.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC14 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E102 E108 E227 E260 E27 E290 E41 E447 E52 E56 E60 E76 E86 E90 E97 EM5 H1 H5 H7 HA1 HA5 HA7 RA27 RA76 SO1 T27 T60 T90 WT88; CH5; 12; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#0849; 01:18PM; 3199 N Barham Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3z1VDia" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3z1VDia</a>; #HollywoodHills; Approximately one-quarter-acre of grass burning uphill. No structures threatened.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC14 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E227 E27 E41 E447 E60 E76 E86 E90 EM5 H5 HA5 RA76 SO1 T27; CH5; 12; Nicholas Prange

Update Cliff Rescue; INC#0133; 02:50AM; 807 W Paseo Del Mar; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3bdMymN" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3bdMymN</a>; #SanPedro; *Corrections* Due to deteriorating conditions and visibility, Air Operations was unable to assist with the body recovery. Firefighters on the ground are performing a second land-based rope rescue to recover the deceased individual (adult female). The adult female who was part-way down the slope was rescued and found to be uninjured, with no hospital transport required.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; AO1 BC4 BC6 BT1 BT2 BT5 E101 E112 E203 E248 E285 E48 E5 E85 EM13 H1 H5 HA1 HA5 RA101 RA112 RA36 RA5 RA85 RH114 T3 T48 T85 UR5 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Cliff Rescue; INC#0133; 01:44AM; 807 W Paseo Del Mar; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3bdMymN" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3bdMymN</a>; #SanPedro; Firefighters responded to Point Fermin to find one person deceased near the bottom of the cliffs, and one person in need of medical attention and rescue part-way down. Firefighters set up a rescue rope system to access, treat, and remove the person. Firefighters will be transporting one to the hospital. Air operations will be assisting with body recovery after the land-based rescue is complete. Unknown age/gender.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; AO1 BC4 BC6 BT1 BT2 BT5 E101 E112 E203 E248 E285 E48 E5 E85 EM13 H1 H5 HA1 HA5 RA101 RA112 RA36 RA5 RA85 RH114 T3 T48 T85 UR5 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1960; 12:17AM; 7406 S Figueroa St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4bYpl6r" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4bYpl6r</a>; #VermontKnolls; Firefighters arrived to find a two-story apartment building (site of previous burns) with fire through the roof. Firefighters briefly began the fire fight in defensive mode, applying hose streams from the exterior only, and quickly transitioned to offensive mode to get inside and apply water directly to the seat of the fire. Ultimately, it took 46 firefighters 22 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E21 E221 E264 E266 E57 E64 E66 RA33 RA57 SQ21 T21 T64 T66; CH7; 15; Nicholas Prange
